**Notice of Grant of Standing Offer**

Public Works and Government Services (Canada) invites interested contractors to participate in the bidding process for the construction of an outdoor building and installation of a generator at Waskaganish Airport, Quebec.

**Background:**

The Canadian government has a requirement for the construction of an outdoor building containing a shelter with a generator and a tank located at Waskaganish Airport. The contractor selected through this process will be responsible for the design, construction, and installation of the building and generator, as well as site preparation and coordination with the airport authorities.

**Scope:**

The scope of work includes the design, construction, and installation of an outdoor building with the following features:

* A weather-resistant and insulated
